attributes.additional_details:
We demand that the NI Executive's reverse its threat to our bus services.

Public Transport is good for our environment and for our town centre businesses. Cutting bus services will result in the most vulnerable in our society being isolated, depriving them of access to shops, services and health. This cut targets the elderly, disabled, those with children and the poor.

Hands off Our Bus Services!!

Town services identified for closure: Armagh,   Ballyclare, Ballynahinch, Banbridge, Carrickfergus, Cookstown, Downpatrick, Enniskillen, Limavady,  Magherafelt, Newcastle, Newtownabbey, Omagh and Strabane. Other services to be cut: Antrim, Ballymena, Bangor, Dungannon, Lurgan, Portadown and Newry.
